description: The new cameras are operating in areas that have a history of speed-related collisions.
title: Republic of Ireland: 900 new speed camera zones operating
title_page: Republic of Ireland: 900 new speed camera zones operating - BBC News
maintext: "We're putting the message out there that we'd like people to slow down for the entire duration of their journey in order to help make the roads safer and to prevent fatalities and life-changing injuries," he said.
